title: Blood Moon Ritual
description: (Witch In The Woods, #3)The Blood Moon is near…And so is the end…Victor and his friends face more dangers as they race against time to collect the remaining items for the ritual, and cure Valeri before the full moon.Will their meeting with Athanasius reveal the Witch’s name? Complications arise as Fabian appears to accept his curse, and Clearly grows weaker with each passing day, making Victor question if there will be a ritual after all… And if there is, will the Witch succeed?
author: Taylor Ann Bunker
